Hero Sections.Description: A hero section with a prominent Call-to-Action button to capture user attention.
A section divided into two, featuring text on one side and an image or graphic on the other.
Hero Sections.Variants: Left Image, Right Image, Full-Width Background

Hero Sections.Description: A hero section with a looping video background for dynamic visual appeal.

About Sections.Description: An overview section that explains the mission, vision, and values of the company.
About Sections.Variants: Text Focused, Image Accompanied, Video Embedded

About Sections.Description: Display of team members with their profiles, roles, and optional links to social media.
A timeline displaying the major milestones or achievements of the company over time.
About Sections.Variants: Horizontal Timeline, Vertical Timeline, Step by Step

Services/Features Sections.Description: An overview of the services provided, typically using icons or images for each service.
A section that compares features of different products or plans side by side.

Portfolio & Case Study Sections.Description: A gallery showcasing a visual portfolio of projects, images, or work.
A detailed showcase of case studies that highlight specific projects and their outcomes.

Call-to-Action Sections.Description: A section focused on one primary Call-to-Action button to drive user engagement.
A section with two distinct Call-to-Action buttons allowing for user choice.

Pricing Sections.Description: Display a single pricing plan, often used for simple subscription services.
Multiple pricing tiers or packages presented in columns with feature comparisons.

Product/Service Showcase Sections.Description: A grid layout showcasing multiple products with images, descriptions, and prices.
An interactive carousel displaying products one at a time for user navigation.

Blog & Content Sections.Description: A grid of recent blog posts with thumbnails, titles, and summaries.
Highlight a specific or trending blog post prominently in a section.

Contact Sections.Description: A simple form where users can contact the company by entering their details and a message.
A section answering frequently asked questions with collapsible answers.

Footer Sections.Description: A minimalist footer with copyright, links, and social media icons.
A footer with multiple sections including contact info, links, and social media.

Navigation/Headers.Description: A basic navigation bar with links to different pages and the website logo.
A navigation bar that includes dropdown menus for subpages or categories.

Team/People Sections.Description: Display team members' profiles with images, names, roles, and social links.
Highlight available job positions and encourage users to apply.

Error Pages.Description: A 'Page Not Found' error page with an optional link back to the homepage.
A 'Server Error' page with a message to contact support.
